div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 78 Orchomenus, Boeotia, 1920 (769) Burial: c. 323 B.C. Contents: 133 AR Phocis: fr. Orchomenus: triob.; fr. Coroneia?: fr. Plataea: triob. Thebes: triob.; fr. Tanagra: fr. Sicyon: 15 fr. Elis: 8 st.; triob.; 1 fr. Disposition: Formerly A. Petsalis; Athens 17 (ob. or smaller of Phocis, Orcho- menus, Tanagra, Thebes, Sicyon) Seltman, The Temple Coins of Olympia (Cam- bridge, 1921), pp. 111-3
